toString

public static java.lang.String toString(java.io.File file,
                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Convert the content of the given file to a String instance.

Parameters:
file - A File instance.
charset - The character set of the content of the file. If null is given, the default character set of the platform is used.
Returns:
The content of the file.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 'file' argument is null.
java.io.IOException - The file size is too big, or some other general I/O error occurred.
